mapper.sql: ObjectID, Birthday, Gender, EntryDate, DepartureDate, ServiceState, Email, Email2, Appellation, EmployeeNumber, EmployeeRank, Title, Password, Mobile, ImageName, WeChatAccount, IsConsoleUser, FacsimileTelephoneNumber, IpPhone, HomePhone, OfficePhone, Pager, QQ, RTX, MSN, Skype, Country, CountryName, Province, City, Street, PostOfficeBox, PostalCode, IDNumber, SID, MobileType, DeviceToken, PrivacyLevel, Notification, CalendarId, DefaultLanguage, ParentID, SourceParentID, CompanyID, Admin, SystemID, Visibility, CategoryID, State, Name, Description, Code, ManagerID, ViceManagerID, SecretaryID, SupervisorID, CreatedTime, ModifiedTime, SortKey, WorkflowCode, ParentObjectID, ParentPropertyName, ParentIndex
mapper.select: select a.* , (case when b3.name is not null then b3.name else (case when b2.name is not null then b2.name else (case when b1.name is not null then b1.name else (case when b.name is not null then b.name else '' end)end)end)end) bmmc from OT_User a left join h3cloud.dbo.OT_OrganizationUnit b on a.ParentID = b.ObjectID left join h3cloud.dbo.OT_OrganizationUnit b1 on b.ParentID = b1.ObjectID left join h3cloud.dbo.OT_OrganizationUnit b2 on b1.ParentID = b2.ObjectID left join h3cloud.dbo.OT_OrganizationUnit b3 on b2.ParentID = b3.ObjectID where a.name like #{text,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} or a.code like #{text,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} order by a.name
mapper.insert:
